definition: see 洋基隊|洋基队[Yang2 ji1 dui4]/New York Yankees (US baseball team)

sentences.english: He whiffed 10 Mets in a game last June 17 at Yankee Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 去年他在洋基球場上三振掉了10顆梅子。

sentences.english: In other words, Mussina wishes the team could have that seventh inning back.
sentences.chinese: 換言之，老穆希望洋基能夠時光倒流到那個第七局。

sentences.english: This time, it was Melky Cabrera's shot that tied it for New York.
sentences.chinese: 這一次，是牛奶爲洋基打出追平比數的陽春炮。

sentences.english: In New York fashion, the stage was set for a Rocket showcase.
sentences.chinese: 在現在的洋基裏，這個舞臺是爲了火箭人表演而設立。

sentences.english: Mind flayers enslaved entire races, including the githyanki forerunners.
sentences.chinese: 奪心魔奴役着整個種族，包括吉斯洋基人的先驅者們。

sentences.english: Wang didn't learn his sinker until he signed with the Yankees .
sentences.chinese: 小王其實沒有學過下沉球一直到他和洋基簽約後。

sentences.english: Yankee Stadium is the center of the center of baseball.
sentences.chinese: 洋基體育場是棒球中心的中心。

sentences.english: You know who was in town this weekend, went to a Yankee game?
sentences.chinese: 你們知道今天誰進城看洋基隊比賽了嗎？

sentences.english: If the Yankees had lost, they would have been tied with the Blue Jays for third place in the division.
sentences.chinese: 假如洋基輸球，那麼他們將會和藍鳥並列分區第三。

sentences.english: The New York Yankees are a team possessed.
sentences.chinese: 洋基隊現在整隊都像著了魔。

sentences.english: Five Yankees had run-scoring hits in the frame.
sentences.chinese: 共有五位洋基球員在他的投球下回到本壘。

sentences.english: and the Yankees Stadium was right where we are standing at pretty much.
sentences.chinese: 洋基體育場曾經就在我們現在站的地方。

sentences.english: Pavano said that the program can come with him to Yankee Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 痛說這個計畫會和他一起來到洋基球場。

sentences.english: But, Ponson was good enough to be picked up by the Yankees .
sentences.chinese: 但胖松的表現，還是足夠好到讓洋基願意把它撿回來。

sentences.english: George Steinbrenner at Yankee Camp during spring training in March 1981.
sentences.chinese: 喬治施泰因布倫納春季1981年3月在洋基訓練營。

sentences.english: In nineteen twenty-one, the Yankees' manager suspended Ruth from playing.
sentences.chinese: 在一九二一年，洋基隊的經理暫停播放露絲。

definition: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania/abbr. for 費拉德爾菲亞|费拉德尔菲亚[Fei4 la1 de2 er3 fei1 ya4]
(Tw) (American) Indian/native American/indigenous peoples of the Americas/also written 印第安[Yin4 di4 an1]

pinyin: Mai4 di2 xun4 hua1 yuan2 guang3 chang3
